trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were 4 other sightings in Philadelphia on or around November 19th 2008
divs: sighting detailson wed 11\19 at approx. 8:16 i was going to the store around 8:20 pm eastern time and roughly in the direction of philadelphia (se from my location) at about 40degrees e x se there were several (approx20-30)vertical white lines (cloud like in color) about 10 degrees in length. they reminded me of the northern lights but they were white\colorless and they were too far south and not in the northern part of the sky. i also see on the map that someone from royersford, pa saw the same thing. they almost resembled spot lights being shined directly up but they were too soft in appearance to be spot lights. some appeared to go all the way down to the tree line others faded out before reaching the ground, so if you imagined them as all being at the same distance frow me, some were longer than others. also earlier i thought i saw a spot light n x nw from my location but now i wonder if it was another one of these "lights" it seemed to me that they were meteorlogical\magnetic in nature but it's nothing i've ever seen b4 and my eyes are always on the skies and stars. they did not move (like vertical contrails) and inspired no feelings of fear in me, only ..wow.. look at that! if you even glimpsed at that part of the sky you could not miss them. they were spread out across about 90degrees azimuth and 10-20 degrees of declination. i actually tried to drag my mother out to look at them but it was too cold for her. i did tell the woman working at the rite aid that i went to. does anybody have a clue what this was? i would love to hear from anybody else that saw them.
